definitions.definition: in a way that is soft and light, not strong, extreme or violent

examples.text: Simmer the soup gently for 30 minutes.
leaves moving gently in the breeze

definitions.definition: in a calm, kind and quiet way

examples.text: ‘You miss them, don't you?’ he asked gently.

definitions.definition: in a way that slopes very gradually

examples.text: The path ran gently down to the sea.

definitions.definition: used to tell somebody to be careful

examples.text: Gently! You'll hurt the poor thing!
Don't go too fast—**gently does it!**
